directions: Bring chicken broth to a boil in a large pot; cook tortellini in boiling broth until tender, about 6 minutes.
Stir tomatoes, beans, zucchini, red wine vinaigrette, basil, and black pepper into the broth; cook until the zucchini is tender, about 6 minutes more. Top with Parmesan cheese to serve.
ingredients: 1 (15.5 ounce) can white kidney beans (cannellini), rinsed and drained
1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste
title: Simple Tortellini Soup
